title: Commit to Your Calling and Claim Your Abundance
description:
There’s a reason they call me the life coach whisperer. Throughout my career, I’ve helped thousands of people rise up to serve their spiritual purpose. I’ve seen lawyers, nurses and hairdressers transform into the most beautiful teachers, authors and speakers. But first, almost all of them had to overcome a major block: the resistance to being still. Does that sound familiar? It’s cool if it does. I used to live in go-go-go mode too. In this episode of Dear Gabby, I’ll teach you how to slow down, get grounded in your purpose, and watch the miracles start to flow. Plus, I spill the beans on my new FREE training: Your 5-Step Guide to Unlock Purpose and Abundance.

On this episode, we’ll dive deep into: 

  • The 5 blocks that are standing between you and your spiritual calling—and how to bust through them 

  • How to bring your light and spiritual alignment to any environment you’re in (even if it’s a workplace you’re not jiving with)

  • How to shift your perception to find peace in your current circumstances

  • A beautiful technique for connecting with your core, adult-resourced self to help guide you through moments of doubt 

  • How to welcome uncomfortable situations as opportunities for growth 

If you’re looking for some guidance to help you meet your spiritual calling, this episode is for you!
 
RESOURCES:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

Head over here to get my free guided meditations: Gabby bernstein.com/freemeditations: https://bit.ly/3v60fO3

Join my Spirit Junkie Masterclass: https://bit.ly/3AB4DWL

BOOKS

Super Attractor: https://gabbybernstein.com/superattractorbook/ 

The Universe Has Your Back: https://gabbybernstein.com/universe-has-your-back/ 

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIPS

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/3BG4NNK

MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES

Safety, Recovery and Mental Health Resources: https://bit.ly/3BE81Bj

 

PARTNERS

I want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/deargabby

 

Find the relief product range and the whole dosist health line-up today at dosisthealth.com. Use promo code DEARGABBY for 20% off your purchase. Now through 12/31/21

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Go to GreenChef.com/gabby125 and use code gabby125 to get $125 off including free shipping!

 

Produced by Dear Media.
